title: Number of Boeing aircraft orders by airline 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Airline in the x axis and Number of aircraft orders in the y axis.
The maximum Number of aircraft orders 49.0 is found at Airline Unidentified and the minimum is found at FedEx Express where Airline is 7.0.
There is a difference of 42.0 between the maximum Airline Unidentified and minimum Airline FedEx Express.
